name: G-Max Resonance
effect: The Ice-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Hailstorm while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 1 to a single enemy. Activates Aurora Veil on the user's field for 4 turns, ignoring the weather requirement.
description: The user's voice forms and drops boulders of ice on top of the enemy. With ice everywhere, a veil that protects the team is formed.
